content: learn how to crochet this beautiful winter scarf with this crochet pattern this pattern features the popular suzette stitch and is worked in blocks of colour no fringe is needed but optional a free copy of this pattern can be found on my ad supported blog as of october 8 2021 https //richtexturescrochet com a free video tutorial can be found on my youtube channel as of october 8 2021 https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 16 sts x 14 row of suzette stitch = 4 inches finished size 8 x 67 inches laid flat yarn wool-ease® by lion brand® yarn 80% acrylic 20% wool 197 yds/180 m 3oz/85 g 4 medium/worsted weight colour b 1 ball of canyon sunset colour a 2 balls of fisherman hook size h/8 5 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge
